FOLDER.NAME: Shared_Rebates_RCI
FOLDER.DESCRIPTION: Shared folder for Rebates RCI Objects

SOURCE.DESCRIPTION: This source object is for the Coventry payment reporting process and specifically for the Invoice layouts, the detail. This is an intermediary file, produced in the beginning of the process with data from TCLAIM_RPT_DTL, then after the CDD data is extracted it is used to merge with this file to produce the final Invoice layout for Coventry.
SOURCE.NAME: F_COVENTRY_INV_DTL_WRK_FILE

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Add Currently Processed Flat File Name Port

SOURCEFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This key field is needed in order to merge this file back with the CDD extract that will be produced later in the Coventry workflow.
SOURCEFIELD.NAME: CRD_CLM_GID

SOURCEFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This field is sourced from the TCLAIM_RPT_DETL MEDD_PRTC_CD.
SOURCEFIELD.NAME: CRD_MEDD_PRTC_CD

SOURCEFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This field is sourced from the TCLAIM_RPT_DETL CLM_LVL1 (natural claim id from the adjudication source)
SOURCEFIELD.NAME: CRD_CLM_LVL1

SOURCEFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This field is sourced from the TCLAIM_RPT_DETL DRUG_NM (NDC Brand name, not Label name)
SOURCEFIELD.NAME: CRD_DRUG_NM

SOURCEFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This field is sourced from the TCLAIM_RPT_DETL CORP_NME, the drug manufacturer name.
SOURCEFIELD.NAME: CRD_CORP_NME

SOURCEFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This field is sourced from the TCLAIM_RPT_DETL UOM_CD (Unit of Measurement)
SOURCEFIELD.NAME: CRD_UOM_CD

SOURCEFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This field is sourced from the trigger file field, STMT_END_DT field from the KSZ6020 table.
SOURCEFIELD.NAME: TRG_INV_DT

SOURCEFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This field is sourced from the TCLAIM_RPT_DETL, a sum of the invoiced amounts. The first char of this value is either space (representing positive numeric values) or a negative sign for negative values.
SOURCEFIELD.NAME: CRD_RBATE_AMTS

SOURCEFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This field is sourced from the TCLAIM_RPT_DETL, the quarter value based on the PERIOD_ID.
SOURCEFIELD.NAME: CRD_PERIOD_ID_QTR

SOURCEFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This field is sourced from the TCLAIM_RPT_DETL, the quarter year based on the PERIOD_ID.
SOURCEFIELD.NAME: CRD_PERIOD_ID_YR

SOURCEFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This field is sourced from the TCLAIM_RPT_DETL TRAN_TYP_CD.
SOURCEFIELD.NAME: CRD_TRAN_TYP_CD

SOURCEFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This field is sourced from the TCLAIM_RPT_DETL EXTL_LVL1_ID (carrier)
SOURCEFIELD.NAME: CRD_EXTNL_LVL1_ID

SOURCEFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This field is sourced from the TCLAIM_RPT_DETL EXTL_LVL2_ID (account)
SOURCEFIELD.NAME: CRD_EXTNL_LVL2_ID

SOURCEFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This field is sourced from the TCLAIM_RPT_DETL EXTNL_LVL3_ID (group)
SOURCEFIELD.NAME: CRD_EXTNL_LVL3_ID

SOURCEFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This field is sourced from the TCLAIM_RPT_DETL NDC_NB.
SOURCEFIELD.NAME: CRD_NDC_NB

SOURCEFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This field is sourced from the TCLAIM_RPT_DETL DSPND_DT, but it has the day stripped out of it and is in format of YYYYMM.
SOURCEFIELD.NAME: CRD_DSPND_DT

SOURCEFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This field is sourced from the TCLAIM_RPT_DETL INGRD_COST_AMT. The first char of this value is either space (representing positive numeric values) or a negative sign for negative values.
SOURCEFIELD.NAME: CRD_INGRD_COST_AMT

SOURCEFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This field is sourced from the TCLAIM_RPT_DETL FRMLY_ID
SOURCEFIELD.NAME: CRD_FRMLY_ID

SOURCEFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This field is sourced from the TCLAIM_RPT_DETL CLM_LVL2 (natural claim id sequence number)
SOURCEFIELD.NAME: CRD_CLM_LVL2

SOURCEFIELD.DESCRIPTION: This field is sourced from the TCLAIM_RPT_DETL CLAIM_TYPE
SOURCEFIELD.NAME: CRD_CLAIM_TYPE
